description:
＊ Phone Style, iScreen it! ＊

iScreen - personalized homescreen with various Widgets & Themes & Wallpaper to make your phone screen stand out!

*iOS 26 Unlocked​！, featuring liquid glass effects and over 1000+ 3D space wallpapers and themes. Added dynamic Control Center customization for a more practical and fun experience.

You can not only keep pets and grow plants on the Dynamic Island, customize your Lock Screen with Interactive, Weather, Battery, Launcher, X-Panel, Text & Icon, Animation, Work Clock, Step Count widgets, but also add Home Screen widgets like Dynamic Panel, Photos, Scrolling Album, To-Do List, Countdown, Digital Clock, Calendar, Emoji Notes, Fan, Air Conditioner, and more for greater fun. Besides widgets, iScreen also offers various Themes, Wallpapers, AI-generated artwork, Charging Animations, and other features to make your phone screen more beautiful and unique.

Special feature:  
【iOS 26】
Fun iOS 26 Features, customized with 1000+ 3D space wallpapers and themes. Added dynamic Control Center effects to make your phone truly one-of-a-kind!

【Control Center】
Customize your Control Center style with colorful icons. Features include a Counter, Water Reminder, Book of Answers, Dice Roll, and Quick Launch—combining beauty and practicality.

【DIY Wallpapers】
Create static or dynamic wallpapers with rich templates like Polaroid, Heart Puzzle, Flip Card, and Animated Marquee Lights to make your home screen unique.

【Widgets】
Includes popular widgets such as Dynamic Panel, Photo Wall, Weather, Battery, Countdown, Calendar, X-Panel, Emoji Notes, Digital Clock, Ferris Wheel, Windmill, and Air Conditioner. It also offers creative lock screen styles like Emojis, Animations, and Icons, with support for transparent effects — making your phone both fun and practical.

【Charging Animation】
Cool and interesting charging animations with custom effects for a personalized charging experience.

【Couple Widgets】
Sweet widgets designed for couples and friends. Send messages and photos to each other’s screens, and check real-time distance, weather, and moods.

【Interactive Widgets】
Quickly complete to-do check-ins or play games like Whack-a-Mole and Arcade without opening the app—adding fun to your daily routine.

【Themes & Wallpapers】
A vast collection of daily updated themes and wallpapers, including trending styles like Ins, minimalist, pink & black, AI art, and paper-cut designs. Easily elevate your home screen’s style and personalize your phone!

【Dynamic Island】
We offers a variety of fun features, such as Pet Island, Plant Island, Animation Island, Weather Island, Panel Island, Calendar Island, Signature Island, Launcher Island, Timer Island, and more. It comes with multiple built-in creative animations, and you can also custom upload images or avatars to your Dynamic Island and set exclusive quotes

Mico — Your Home Screen Personalization App, fully optimized for OS 26！
Fully adapted for OS 26 — unlock customizable Animated Artwork, explore a wide range of popular 3D & Depth Effect Wallpapers, and enjoy the upgraded Liquid Glass Theme that brings a unique texture to your home screen.
【OS 26 Depth Effect Wallpaper & Liquid Glass Theme】
* Depth Effect Wallpaper：Specially optimized for OS 26, the all-new Depth Effect Wallpapers use intelligent layering and spatial design to seamlessly blend time and wallpaper elements, bringing a vivid sense of depth and personality to your screen.
* Liquid Glass Theme：Explore the artistic fusion of light and fluid textures, unlocking a fresh and unique visual experience.

【DIY Live Wallpapers & Battery Icon Wallpaper】
Supports static/dynamic wallpaper creation, with a wide range of templates like Polaroid, heart collage, flip cards, labubu live wallpaper, and more. There are also various battery icon stickers and battery widget to personalize the top status bar of your phone, making your wallpapers even more fun. Your home screen becomes a unique design that's truly your own.

【Theme Template, One-Click To Use】 
Mico's theme pack lets you mix and match stylish widgets and lock screen templates to create a home screen that's uniquely yours. Top widgets and stunning wallpapers created by designers from around the world—yours to use with just a tap. Effortlessly design your perfect home screen.

【Home & Lock Screen Widgets】 
Transform your iOS experience with customizable widgets for both Home Screen and Lock Screen!  
*Couple widget: Couple widgets let you and your partner share a little love right on your home screens. No matter how far apart you are, you’ll always feel connected.
*Battery widget: The Battery Widget not only shows your power level but also matches your home screen aesthetic with customizable styles and themes.
*Photo widget: provide a variety of styles of photo frames, cute pets, retro game consoles, movie film styles, everything 
*Animation widgets: emoticon packs, flashing emoticons, GIF, bear emoticon animations, cute cat animations, flashing hearts... 

【New iOS 18 Widgets & Themes】
Fully compatible with iOS 18 – supports customizing the control center and lock screen buttons, with plenty of cute, text, and animated icons. 

【Support Apple Health Tracking】 
Mico Lock Screen Widget integrates Apple Health App to display health data such as steps in widgets. If you want to use a super widget that contains health data, please allow the APP to access health data when entering the widget preview page.

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.

Features at a Glance

Live Wallpapers: Animated lockscreen backgrounds & home screen motion

DIY Wallpaper: Custom background studio with templates, text & stickers

Charging Animations: Dynamic power-on effects for every charge

PFP Icons: Profile picture avatars in multiple styles and resolutions

Matching Wallpaper Sets: Coordinated lockscreen + home screen bundles

4K Quality: Ultra-HD backgrounds and exports

Ready to elevate your iPhone experience? Download Wallpics now and unlock a universe of live wallpapers, DIY creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper, and 4K quality backgrounds—tailored just for you!

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

developer: Tianjin Nankai Xuewei Technology Studio (Individually Owned Business)
description:
Dynamic Island & Home Screen & Lock Screen [Ad-Free] Beautiful Widgets, activate in Dynamic Island with one tap: real-time network speed, frame rate, step count, running distance, memory, CPU, heart rate, off-duty countdown, phone usage count, trending topics, to-do list, weather, ticket countdown, custom photos, lunar calendar, quick launch, Pomodoro timer, real-time parcel tracking, speed, altitude, water reminder, motivational quotes, calendar, reminders, notes, HRV mental stress, blood oxygen, stride length, walking speed, stair climbing, standing time, environmental noise, headphone volume, and more.

'Island Widgets' is an innovative Dynamic Island and Lock Screen widget app, bringing a new user experience to your iOS device. With beautifully designed widgets, you can easily access the following information without opening the app:

1. Quick Launch: Open any app, webpage, or shortcut in Dynamic Island and Lock Screen.

2. Useful Tools: Real-time frame rate, network speed, CPU, memory, driving speed, altitude, and more.

3. Health Data: Real-time step count, running distance, heart rate, body temperature, calorie consumption, HRV mental stress, blood oxygen, stride length, walking speed, stair climbing, standing time, environmental noise, headphone volume, and more, helping you stay mindful of your health.

4. Phone Usage Habits: Track how many times you pick up your phone and your total screen time, helping you better understand your usage patterns.

5. Countdown: Simply set the off-duty time, and the app will precisely countdown, helping you plan your workday and leave on time to enjoy your leisure time.

6. Custom Countdown: Easily track and countdown to special moments like deadlines or anniversaries, so you never miss important moments.

7. Weather Forecast: Provides accurate weather information to help you plan your activities.

8. Stay Updated: Browse the trending topics and social media trends with the hot search feature, keeping you connected to current events and social buzz.

9. To-Do List: Keep your to-do tasks visible and easy to manage.

10. Water Reminder: Customize reminders, and conveniently log water intake in Dynamic Island without opening the app.

11. Motivational Quotes: Get inspired with motivational quotes on Dynamic Island and Lock Screen.

12. Reminders: Manage reminders directly from Dynamic Island and Lock Screen without opening the app.

13. Calendar: Never miss an important schedule again.

We not only provide you with these rich features but are also constantly developing new ones to meet your needs. The upcoming updates will bring even more Dynamic Island and Lock Screen widgets, enriching your experience.

We are committed to being the best widget app!

Download 'Island Widgets' now and enjoy this fantastic app, bringing new life to your iOS device!
